attributes.action: Freeze repayments of rent/mortgage, credit and loan payments during Coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: Families, people on sick pay, self employed and businesses will suffer during a shut down. We need to freeze debts before they escalate out of control and start to provide a huge drag on disposal income, quality of life.
attributes.background: Stop the financial drag and snowball effect of debt while quarantine measures are in place with an additional month for people to return to work.
